definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生态时装还证明它在时尚界有着足够的影响力。

sentences.english: Will you please use your influence with him not to do it?
sentences.chinese: 请你运用你的影响力叫他不要做那事好吗？

sentences.english: We're always looking for influence, especially with music.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是在寻找具有影响力的人物，尤其是在乐坛。

sentences.english: It is an extrapolation with consequences.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个有后续影响力的外推。

sentences.english: Toge ther they would have the legitimacy and the clout to tackle almost any issue.
sentences.chinese: 这样他们既合法又有影响力能解决几乎所有问题。

sentences.english: The Astor family is another influential Illuminati family.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯他家族是另一个有影响力的光照派家族。

sentences.english: China is one of the most powerful countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 直目下现古是天下上最具有影响力的国家之一。

sentences.english: On those days Mercury will conjoin Jupiter, a lovely influence.
sentences.chinese: 届时水星将结合木星，产生可爱的影响力。

sentences.english: The Tzolk'in is the most important and the one with the most influence.
sentences.chinese: 卓尔金历最重要，是其中一种最有影响力的历。

sentences.english: The global implications of this divorce are huge.
sentences.chinese: 这场离婚案的全球影响力是巨大的。
“军械库”是颇有影响力的品牌。

sentences.english: Benching a star can have an even stronger impact.
sentences.chinese: 替补席上的明星可以有一个更强大的影响力。

sentences.english: The rise of the redback will be a super, true story.
sentences.chinese: 人民币崛起的影响力将是宏伟而真实的故事。

sentences.english: Use your influence.It is a powerful agent for change.
sentences.chinese: 运用你的影响力，这是变化发生的强有力的原动力。

sentences.english: But amid normal people these blandishments have no authority.
sentences.chinese: 不过这种甘言劝诱在普通人中影响力甚微。

sentences.english: And we think that this is just incredible impact.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为这是非常难以置信的影响力。

definition: to have the power to rally supporters
ability to have one's say and be listened to/influence/clout
